select smt_bss_cpc_sftt_sequence.nextval
insert into object_label_rel (OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID, LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE_ID, LABEL_VALUE, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{objectLabelRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{labelValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{labelValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update object_label_rel set LABEL_ID = #{labelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LABEL_VALUE_ID = #{labelValueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LABEL_VALUE = #{labelValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_TYPE = #{objType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID = #{objectLabelRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID, LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE_ID, LABEL_VALUE, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from object_label_rel where OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID = #{objectLabelRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID, LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE_ID, LABEL_VALUE, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from object_label_rel

select OBJECT_LABEL_REL_ID, LABEL_ID, LABEL_VALUE_ID, LABEL_VALUE, OBJ_TYPE, OBJ_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from object_label_rel where OBJ_ID = #{objId} and OBJ_TYPE = 1900
mapper.delete: delete from object_label_rel where where OBJ_ID = #{objId} and OBJ_TYPE = 1900
